alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:39PM CST until March 11 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 3 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Lincoln and Lyon Counties. In South Dakota, Brookings County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 3 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southeasterly winds will result in further reduced visibilities in blowing snow, primarily while the snow is falling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
